node.title: Episode 8- Oak Haven & Eden Valley Foster Care Mission
node.description:
This episode features two OCI ministries. The first is Oak Haven, located in Pullman, Michigan. Through natural, healthy food, Oak Haven connects with people and shares the love of Christ in Michigan and beyond.

 

The second ministry is Eden Valley Foster Care Mission in Tanzania. This ministry aims to reach at-risk young people, the ministry works with many AIDS orphans and other teenagers who have no support. These young people receive training in carpentry and tailoring in order to be able to support themselves.
